CHAT.comment: Chi dominates the activity and tells Mot how to participate in the play. Chi directs activities and speaks rapidly. There is almost no talk about magnetic force , but Chi enjoys the play activity. Chi invents games and engages in fantasy play. agnets are set up on a table; Chi and Mot are seated at close corners of the table; the black base has most of the objects stuck to it.

u.a: moves horsehoe magnet over the black base
pulls silver ball off yellow wand
holds up horseshoe magnet with silver ball stuck to it
picks up plastic bag and dumps out remaining objects
holds the coins in her hand
MOT helps Chi add up the amount of the coins
puts face in camera and sticks out toungue
picks up blue arrow magnet and sticks it to horseshoe magnet; moves horseshoe magnet with arrow stuck to it over the black base and pulls the arrow off
two plastic magnet balls are stuck together on the table
pulls the magnet balls apart
places magnet balls on either side of the plastic turtle on the table
EXP and Mot talk about EXP's child
plastic magnet balls
MOT and EXP talk about children
joining Mot and EXP's conversation
Chi is pulling washers and nuts off the silver circle on the black base
moves magnet balls into a line on the table
pulls nut off black base and puts it on table
picks up silver stick
touches silver stick to black base
pulls more magnets off black base
picks up yellow wand
moves those objects together on the table
waves yellow wand over the four magnet balls and two silver men on the table; the magnet balls stick to the wand
pulls balls off wand
waves wand over objects again; two silver men and a ball stick to wand
holds up wand with objects stuck to it
pulls remaining objects off wand
waves wand over objects that are still stuck to the black base
tries unsuccessfully to get wand to pull washer off silver circle on black base
puts down yellow wand and pulls a washer and a nut off the black base
picks up a washer and places it on the black base
grabs washer and pulls it off
only the silver circle remains on the black base
pulls objects off yellow wand
picks up horseshoe magnet and holds it over a metal ball and a nut on the table; they stick
pulls nut off horseshoe magnet; moves horseshoe magnet and ball over the black base; sticks ball to base and pulls horseshoe magnet away
MOT
rising
hands yellow wand to Mot
points to black base
uses yellow wand to try and get the magnet ball off the black base
uses horseshoe magnet to pick up another magnet ball from the table
puts ball on base
MOT has already removed first ball from black base
removes second ball from black base with yellow wand
picks up a nut with horseshoe magnet and moves it onto the base
pulls nut off black base with yellow wand
holds horseshoe magnet over a pile of objects; they do not all stick
continues to use horseshoe magnet to transfer objects from the table to the black base
objects Chi has just placed on black base are standing up slightly and are not flat on it
uses yellow wand to pull washer off the black base
power is whispered
picks up blue arrow magnet with horseshoe magnet and puts the arrow on the black base
uses yellow wand to pull blue arrow magnet off the base
moves horseshoe magnet over plastic turtle
picks up silver man; sticks it to horseshoe maget; picks up washer and sticks it to horseshoe magnet , then places silver man and two washers on black base
uses yellow wand to pick up silver man and washer
uses horseshoe magent to pick up a magnet ball and a silver man from the table and places them on the black base
places another silver man on black base
touches silver men on black base
makes a silver man stand on his head on the black base
moves silver man so it is standing up a different way on the black base
puts silver stick on black base
picks up a silver man from the table
picks up plastic teddy bear from table
holds bear up to camera
puts bear down and picks up a penny; attempts to stick it to the black base
uses horseshoe magnet to pick up a paper clip and move it to the black base
the paper clip is stuck to the front of a silver man
sing song
difficult to see what Chi is holding because it is out of camera range
puts a magnet ball between the ends of the horseshoe magnet
holds ball and makes horseshoe magnet swing around it on the table
picks up silver man and sticks it to the end of the horseshoe magnet
puts a magnet ball on the hands of a silver man that is standing on the black base
tries to put a ball on another silver man's hands; knocks the ball from the first man's hands in the process
pulls one of the silver men off black base; another falls over
tries to stand the silver men back up on the base; they keep falling over
talks about listening to Chi play in other room
talks about Chi's imagination
holds a magnet ball over another on the black base
MOT and Chi talk about mass and holy days
picks up yellow wand
waves wand over the objects on the black base
pulls some of the objects off the base with the yellow wnad
clears objects off the wand and moves it back over the black base
Chi is having trouble pulling the yellow wand from the black base
sucessfully removes the yellow wand from the black base with several objects stuck to it
clears objects off yellow wand and puts them on the table
moves yellow wand over black base; picks up objects; clears them off yellow wand
pulls wand away from black base; a silver man is among the objects stuck to it
MOT
<Clutches> appears to be the name given to the <bad guy> in Chi's fantasy play
holds yellow wand over the pile of objects accumulated on the table; they stick to the wand in a chain-like dangling seqeunce
removes objects from the yellow wand
moves yellow wand back over black base and picks up nuts with it
picks up more objects from black base with yellow wand and clears them off
clears objects from the black base with her hands
picks up black base and turns it over
there are objects stuck to the bottom of it; one is a silver man
picks up silver men and puts them down on the table on the other side of the black base
inhaling deeply
picks up yellow wand and uses it to pick up fifth silver man from table and move it to the dungeon
holds yellow wand in one hand and begins to string silver men from the yellow wand
three men are hanging in a chain from the yellow wand; the fourth one won't stick to the third
moves wand over black base and the chain of men is pushed outward slightly
puts fourth man on a different part of the yellow wand
sounds like a trumpet
uses fingers to knock the men one by one from the yellow wand onto the black base
pulls off remaining three silver men and puts them on the table
stands up two silver men on the black base
moves yellow wand over the two silver men on the black base
<$=2> the voice of a princess
picks up one of the silver men from the black base with the yellow wand
taps silver circle on black base with hand
EXP
sticks yellow wand to silver circle
taps silver circle
<$=2> princess voice
stands a man up on the base
sing song
places a silver man on top of another one on the black base
EXP , Chi , and Mot talk about buying the magnet set in a store
